abstract: Federal Judge Reed O'Connor in Texas blocks federal regulation that would extend medical leave to same-sex couples under Family and Medical Leave Act; Texas Atty Gen Ken Paxton argues complying would violate state's constitutional ban on same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: A judge granted a preliminary injunction that stays expansion of the definition of spouse under the Family and Medical Leave Act to include same-sex couples.

headline.main: Texas: Judge Blocks Benefits for Gay Couples
headline.print_headline: Texas: Judge Blocks Benefits for Gay Couples

snippet: A judge granted a preliminary injunction that stays expansion of the definition of spouse under the Family and Medical Leave Act to include same-sex couples.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
